A: 19. According to the material, Opobo kingdom is now part of the modern Rivers State? (a) True (b) False
20. Who made figurative patterned pots of different shapes and sizes using her creative ability? (a) Mary's lessor (b) Hajiya Ladi Kwali
21. Oba Ovonramwen was born in which year? (a) 1888 (b) 1857
22. Which people enjoyed economic prosperity during Oba Ovonramwen's reign? (a) Benin (b) Sokoto
23. Who was regarded as the best Nigerian potter before her death? (a) Margaret Ekpo (b) Ladi Kwali
24. The only Nigerian woman whose picture is on a Nigerian naira currency note is (a) Ladi Kwali (b) Queen Amina
25. Hajiya Ladi Kwali was born in 1925 in (a) Lagos (b) Gwari
26. According to the material, who was a member of the Most Excellent Order of the British Empire (MBE)? (a) Pa Michael Taiwo Akinkunmi (b) Ladi Kwali
27. According to the material, whose people produced artistic works like bronze, decorated brass, ornamental ivory and so on? (a) King Jaja of Opobo (b) Oba Ovonramwen
28. The Abuja pottery was renamed the Ladi Kwali pottery to honor (a) President Bola Ahmed Tinubu (b) Ladi Kwali
29. A hero is usually a noble and someone who has special qualities like courage, love, honesty, patriotism, etc? (a) True (b) False
30. A hero usually fights for the benefits of his people or community? (a) True (b) False
